summary: 2 heroin addicts negotiate their way through Dublin's city centre, encountering friends and family as they search for their next fix.
cast: Tom Murphy|Mark O'Halloran|Gavin Dowdall|Luke Keeler|Michael McElhatton|Laurie Morton|Sylvia Murray|Gary Egan|Dylan Grimes|Shelby Clarke|Deirdre Molloy|Mary Murray|Paul Roe|Thomas Farrell|Pierre Rodgers|Virginia Cole|Ian Cregg|Tomás Ó Súilleabháin|Ion Caramitru|Michael Ryan|John Ryan|Louise Lewis|Sorcha Gibson|David Johnstone|Gerry Moore|Anthony Morris|Joe Hanley|Jim Murray|Ray Meade|David Herlihy|Eamonn Hunt|Ger Carey|Alan Carroll|Anita Reeves|Joe Quigley|Don Crowley|Ian Fitzgibbon|Finbar Furey
title: Adam & Paul
